Hi! I’m Henrique Schall, a economist and consultant in Data Science and Business Analytics, focused on development and validation of statistical and mathematical models for credit risk, pricing, revenue management, economic forecasting and operational optimization. Always seeking to generate value through data

title: Skills
text:
Machine Learning: SVM, Decision Trees, Random Forest, Naïve Baynes, LightGBM, XGBoost.
Deep Learning: Perceptron, MLP, CNN, RNN, Transformers, Autoencoders, GANs, GNN.
Financeiros: ARMA, ARIMA, SARIMA, ARCH, GARCH, VAR, VEC. GenAI: LLM, NLP, RAG, MCP, CLIP.
Outros Modelos: Redes Bayesianas, Google Meridian, Dados em Painel.
